p: The essential oil (EO) was obtained by hydrodistillation process using the Clevenger type apparatus, using 30 g of dried and crushed leaves of A. suaveolens for a period of 2 h at a temperature of approximately 100°C [9]. The essential oil was removed with the aid of a pasteur pipette, and then packaged in the amber bottle wrapped in aluminum foil and kept under refrigeration (4°C) for later analysis.
